about_the_game:
Witch's Dungeon is a small pixel top-down shooter game, you will be played as a witch and advanced through the dungeon! 

   Chouka, woke up in an unknown dungeon when she heard a mysterious woman's voice guiding her to escape. She doesn’t remember how she got here, she just think it’s a hassle and just want to get it over with.

Manual 

WASD - Move Left click/Space bar  Attack

Lshift - Switch weapon

Esc - Open menu

Holding left click will let player keep attacking in that direction without changing direction so you can keep attacking while you dodging

If you are in knocked down stage repeatedly click WASD to escape before the bar filled 

If lust gauge fills you will no longer be able to resist.

E - Use magic beam

However you will lose hp when you use this spell. 

You will need these weapon to progress to the next map by breaking the door using weapon that dropped from the boss Ero Scene with the monster After you are defeated or caught by the monster the ero scene will be played!

Full Voice CG CG fully voiced by 夢乃ちか

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes sexual activities with monsters, e.g. tentacles. If players got attacked by monsters, the main characters may encounter non-consensual sexual activities with monsters. The main character could enter the sexual activity with monsters, however it’s possible for the character to escape from the sexual activity.

There is some usage of fantasy drug in game, for example, love potion or health point recovery potion.

There is no self-harm in the game.

You will need these weapon to progress to the next map by breaking the door using weapon that dropped from the boss Ero Scene with the monster After you are defeated or caught by the monster the ero scene will be played!

name: Witch's Dungeon Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz or AMD FX-4100 @ 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or equivalent with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K @ 3.4GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
